historical_post_examples: Just shipped our new AI feature after 3 months of testing. The user feedback has been incredible - 40% increase in engagement. Building the right team makes all the difference.
Learned something important about product management today: data tells you what happened, but users tell you why. Always start with the conversation.
Growth isn't just about metrics. It's about building something people actually want to use every day. Focus on value first, viral comes second.
Controversial take: Most 'product-market fit' is actually 'founder-market fit.' You can't build what you don't understand deeply.

5 lessons from scaling our team from 5 to 50: 1) Hire for trajectory, not just current skills 2) Culture is what you do when no one's watching 3) Communication systems must evolve with team size 4) Document everything twice 5) Celebrate small wins religiously
